info.name: Enhanced Dabr
info.description:
completely new theme for Dabr
Right To Left (RTL) support 
using "B Yekan" and "UBUNTU" font 
No avatars
status in black color
info.additionalInfo: this style is based on "dabr.co.uk green theme RTL" : http://userstyles.org/styles/31128/dabr-co-uk-green-theme-rtl
